entry.title: Electrum 1.9.8 release
entry.summary: In an email exchange dated March 16, 2014, Thomas Voegtlin responded to feedback regarding a flawed implementation. He stated that he was not aware of the issue and would work on fixing the code. However, further concerns were raised about the implementation leaking approximately 7 bits of data per message chunk and potentially resulting in incorrect decryption of messages. The situation was described as "screwy and suspect."
